item.text: But in the seventh month Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah and grandson of Elishama, who was a member of the royal family and had been one of Zedekiah’s chief officers, came with 10 of his men to Gedaliah son of Ahikam at Mizpah. While they were eating a meal together with him there at Mizpah,

<st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05418" class="">Nethaniah</st> and the <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him <st data-num="06965" class="">stood up</st>, pulled out their <st data-num="02719" class="">swords</st>, and <st data-num="05221" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="01436" class="">Gedaliah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0296" class="">Ahikam</st> and <st data-num="01121" class="">grandson</st> of <st data-num="08227" class="">Shaphan</st>. Thus Ishmael <st data-num="04191" class="">killed</st> the man <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st> had <st data-num="06485" class="">appointed</st> to govern the <st data-num="0776" class="">country</st>.
Ishmael also killed all the Judeans who were with Gedaliah at Mizpah and the Babylonian soldiers who happened to be there.
On the day after Gedaliah had been murdered, before anyone even knew about it,

80 men arrived from Shechem, Shiloh, and Samaria. They had shaved off their beards, torn their clothes, and cut themselves to show they were mourning. They were carrying grain offerings and incense to present at the temple of the Lord in Jerusalem.

<st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05418" class="">Nethaniah</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">went out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="04709" class="">Mizpah</st> to <st data-num="07125" class="">meet</st> them. He was pretending to <st data-num="01058" class="">cry</st><n id="1" /> as he <st data-num="01980" class="">walked</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">along</st>. <st data-num="01961" class="">When</st> he <st data-num="06298" class="">met</st> them, he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, “<st data-num="0935" class="">Come</st> with me <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> meet <st data-num="01436" class="">Gedaliah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0296" class="">Ahikam</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="01961" class="">But as soon</st> as they <st data-num="0935" class="">were</st> <st data-num="0413 08432">inside</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05418" class="">Nethaniah</st> and the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> were <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughtered</st> them and threw their bodies<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413 08432">in</st> a <st data-num="0953" class="">cistern</st>.

But there <st data-num="04672" class="">were</st> <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> among them who <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st>, “Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> us. <st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> we will <st data-num="03426" class="">give</st> you the <st data-num="04301" class="">stores</st> of <st data-num="02406" class="">wheat</st>, <st data-num="08184" class="">barley</st>, <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st>, and <st data-num="01706" class="">honey</st> we have <st data-num="04301" class="">hidden</st> in a <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st>.”<n id="2" /> So he <st data-num="02308" class="">spared</st> their lives and did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st><n id="3" /> them <st data-num="08432" class="">along with</st> the <st data-num="0251" class="">rest</st>.<n id="4" />

Now the <st data-num="0953" class="">cistern</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> <st data-num="07993" class="">threw</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="06297" class="">dead bodies</st> of <st data-num="0376 0834">those</st> he had <st data-num="05221" class="">killed</st> was a <st data-num="01419" class="">large</st> <st data-num="0953" class="">one</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="0609" class="">Asa</st> had <st data-num="06213" class="">constructed</st> as part of his defenses <st data-num="06440" class="">against</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="01201" class="">Baasha</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05418" class="">Nethaniah</st> <st data-num="04390" class="">filled</st> it with <st data-num="02491" class="">dead bodies</st>.<n id="3" />

Then Ishmael took captive all the people who were still left alive in Mizpah. This included the royal princesses and all the rest of the people in Mizpah that Nebuzaradan, the captain of the royal guard, had put under the authority of Gedaliah son of Ahikam. Ishmael son of Nethaniah took all these people captive and set out to cross over to the Ammonites.
Johanan son of Kareah and all the army officers who were with him heard about all the atrocities that Ishmael son of Nethaniah had committed.

So they <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="0376" class="">troops</st> and <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> to <st data-num="03898" class="">fight</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">against</st> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05418" class="">Nethaniah</st>. They <st data-num="04672" class="">caught up with</st> him <st data-num="0413" class="">near</st> the <st data-num="07227" class="">large</st> <st data-num="04325 0834">pool</st><n id="1" /> at <st data-num="01391" class="">Gibeon</st>.

When <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> had <st data-num="01961 0854">taken captive</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03110" class="">Johanan</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07143" class="">Kareah</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st> <st data-num="08269 0834">officers</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him, they <st data-num="08055" class="">were glad</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> those <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> had <st data-num="07617" class="">taken captive</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="04709" class="">Mizpah</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">turned</st> and <st data-num="07725 01980">went over</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03110" class="">Johanan</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07143" class="">Kareah</st>.
But Ishmael son of Nethaniah managed to escape from Johanan along with eight of his men, and he went on over to Ammon.

Johanan son of Kareah and all the army officers who were with him led off all the people who had been left alive at Mizpah. They had rescued them from Ishmael son of Nethaniah after he killed Gedaliah son of Ahikam. They led off the men, women, children, soldiers, and court officials whom they had brought away from Gibeon.

They <st data-num="01980" class="">set out</st> to <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">to</st> <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">to get away from</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st>,<n id="1" /> but <st data-num="03427" class="">stopped</st> at <st data-num="01628 0834">Geruth Kimham</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0681" class="">near</st> <st data-num="01035" class="">Bethlehem</st>.<n id="3" />
They were afraid of what the Babylonians might do because Ishmael son of Nethaniah had killed Gedaliah son of Ahikam, whom the king of Babylon had appointed to govern the country.
